Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Ethiopia 
   Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- An Ethiopian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Addis Ababa on February 2 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16.
 Tatek Kassa, chairman of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to set a commemoration period from Feb. 2 to Apr. 20 and hold colorful events including a seminar, a lecture, a reading session, a film show and a photo exhibition during that period.

Iranian Diplomats Visit Korean Central History Museum 
   Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Jalaleddin Namini Mianji, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the embassy visited the Korean Central History Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of the victory in the Islamic revolution of Iran.
 Hearing the explanation that the Koreans lived in the same territory, creating their common culture, and struggled against aggression, they went round historic relics dating back to the period from primitive ages to middle ages.

Special Resolution Released in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea reportedly held a meeting of its 5th-term deputies on Feb. 4 at which it released a special resolution titled "Let us open a decisive phase for national reunification in 2007 by attaching importance to the nation, defending peace and achieving unity".
 The resolution recalled that the joint statement of the political parties, government and organizations in the north set this year as a "year of attaching importance to the nation, defending peace and achieving unity" and ardently called on all the fellow countrymen in the south and the north and abroad to turn out in the struggle to do so.    
 It stressed that the solidarity would wage a dynamic struggle to carry out the tasks for attaching importance to the nation, defending peace and achieving unity as they are very just ones reflecting the aspiration and wishes of all the fellow countrymen for the peaceful reunification of the country.

Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il 
   Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on his birthday.
 They were handed to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Friday by Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya to the DPRK, who is doyen of the corps.
